mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_email, user_address, user_gender) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userGender})
mapper.select: select user_number from tbl_user where user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPassword}

select pr.user_profile_image_system_name, ur.user_name, ur.user_nickname,ur.user_birth, ur.user_phone_number, ur.user_email, ur.user_address,ur.user_self_introduction from tbl_user ur left outer join tbl_user_profile_image pr on ur.user_number = pr.user_number where ur.user_number = #{userNumber}

select u.user_number, u.user_id, u.user_nickname , count(p.post_number) as post_count, u.user_self_introduction, max(upi.user_profile_original_name) as user_profile_original_name, max(upi.user_profile_image_system_name) as user_profile_image_system_name, (select count(follow_number) from tbl_follow where follow_number = u.user_number) as following_count, (select count(following_number) from tbl_follow where following_number = u.user_number) as followers_count from tbl_user u left join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number left join tbl_user_profile_image upi on u.user_number = upi.user_number where u.user_number = #{userNumber} group by u.user_number
